attributes.action: Petition for an independent investigation into dishonest Parish Councillors.
attributes.additional_details:
Four Parish Councillors from the village of Preston in East Riding of Yorkshire submitted statements to the Standards Committee of East Riding of Yorkshire Council knowing them to be false during an investigation into the behaviour of one of the Parish Councillors, who had aggressively attacked a resident during a council meeting, the attack was entirely unprovoked.

The false witness statements of these councillors created an equality of opinion by reversing the roles of the aggressor and victim and thereby succeeded in preventing the councillor facing any disciplinary action.

The actions of these councillors have brought our Parish Council into disrepute; an independent investigation is needed to restore the good name of Preston Parish Council.


Details are on “Preston Parish Council Problems” please Google it.
